VectorFontCharacter

public VectorFontCharacter(processing.core.PApplet pApplet,
                           java.util.List<org.mt4j.util.math.Vertex[]> contours)
A vector font character class. The specified contour vertices are assumed to lie in the z=0 plane.

Parameters:
pApplet - the applet
contours - the contours
